segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with the sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing by the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that dish, like it's the most important thing right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, the sink is overflowing behind her, water just pouring out everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot right in it, but she seems completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the left, there's a boy climbing on a little stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand inside, grabbing those cookies like a little thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, though, tilting back a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there's a girl standing nearby, reaching up with her hand open, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They make such a cute team, sneaking treats while mom's not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, with bushes and a fence in the distance.
segments.speaker: PAR
